title: Volodymyr Zelenskyy – 2023 Statement on the Situation in Ukraine (02/03/2023)
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Volodymyr Zelenskyy, the President of Ukraine, on 2 March 2023.
content:
I wish you health, dear Ukrainians!
